title: When Evil Takes Over | Real Ghost Stories
description:
Today on another chilling episode of Real Ghost Stories Online.Â 

When a couples arguments get heated to a dangerous level, does something or someone else join in the fight?

Could it be possible that something dark or even evil take over the mind and body of an abuser, causing him to do things far beyond his own soul?

We ask that question and more, today on Real Ghost Stories online!

If you have a real ghost story or supernatural event to report, please write into our show or call 1-855-853-4802!

To get access to:

  • The Worlds LARGEST AUDIO ARCHIVE of GHOST STORIES!
  • New EPP Bonus Episodes Every Week and ALL of our past EPP Bonus Episodes

Then sign up to be a supporter, we call them "EPP's" (Extra Podcast People)!
